function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases through untreated wastewater","Impact":"Increased risk of public health issues and disease outbreaks within the community","Mitigation":"Implementation of proper wastewater treatment processes and protocols to eliminate disease-causing pathogens","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies like UV disinfection, ozonation, and chlorination","People":"Community members, public health workers, and individuals in close proximity to untreated wastewater","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities, and wastewater treatment facility operators"}]}
